name: Green Spaces
description: Green spaces, parks, scrubs, playing fields, etc.
query:
SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon where amenity='park'
  or amenity='gardens'
  or amenity='square'
  or amenity='green'
  or amenity='garden'
  or leisure='garden'
  or leisure='park'
  or leisure='open_space'
  or leisure='recreation_ground'
  or leisure='sports_ground'
  or leisure='dog_park'
  or leisure='sports_ground'
  or leisure='scrub'
  or leisure='common'
  or leisure='stadium'
  or leisure='golf_course'
  or leisure='nature_reserve'
  or (leisure='sports_centre' and building is null or building='no')
  or landuse='forest'
  or landuse='conservation'
  or landuse='cemetery'
  or landuse='recreation_ground'
  or landuse='farmland'
  or "natural"='wood'
